ygData.subject: Re: New to this list and tinkering..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... to an hompage where i can read more about tinkering like wich books i need ( I need books on tinkering right ?) and outher stuff. also if there has been
ygData.messageBody:
At 10:27 PM 7/7/99 +0200, you wrote:
>From: "Zinken" <zinken@...>
>
>Hello all
>
>
>
>I'm new to this list and tho the art of tinkering. Could someoone point me
to an hompage where i can read more about tinkering like wich books i need
( I need books on tinkering right ?) and outher stuff. also if there has
been any good post to this list before and you have saved them i would be
glad if you could mail them to me at zinken@...
>

I run a tinkering site that was created off all the info I and others
(including those on this list) have found and shared. You can view it at
the URL: http://www.eqportal.com/Tinkering

For the tinkering books, one vendor at the windmills in Steamfont sells two
books - Journals of Gimblestan XIV and XV. They will cost you a gold or
two each.

I believe if you go to http://www.onelist.com and search for this list it
has an archive of all the digests - all of the e-mail that was ever sent?

Hope this helps.

-Luke
